<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3401</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Every day ScienceCup of tea</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jeden Tag ScienceCup des Tees</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chaque jour ScienceCup de thé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cada dia ScienceCup do chá</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ogni giorno ScienceCup di tè</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάθε ημέρα ScienceCup του τσαγιού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cada día ScienceCup del té</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a fun hands on activity related to the functions of the brain which identify the size and distance of objects and figures.This activity can be done at home.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">brain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">logic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vision</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">camera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">perception</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist Hände eines Spaßes auf der 
Aktivität, die auf den Funktionen des Gehirns in Verbindung gestanden
wird, die die Größe kennzeichnen und Abstand der Nachrichten und 
figures.This Aktivität zu Hause erfolgt werden können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est des mains d'un amusement sur l'activité 
liée aux fonctions du cerveau qui identifient la taille et la 
distance des objets et l'activité de figures.This peuvent être 
faites à la maison.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é mãos de um divertimento na atividade 
relacionada às funções do cérebro que identificam o tamanho e a 
distância dos objetos e a atividade de figures.This podem ser feitas 
na HOME.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è mani di divertimento su attività 
relativa alle funzioni del cervello che identificano il formato e la 
distanza degli oggetti e l'attività di figures.This possono essere 
fatte nel paese.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια διασκέδαση δίνει στη δραστηριότητα 
σχετική με τις λειτουργίες του εγκεφάλου που προσδιορίζουν το 
μέγεθος και την απόσταση των αντικειμένων και των αριθμών 
Αυτή η δραστηριότητα μπορεί να γίνει στο σπίτι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ésta es manos de una diversión en la actividad 
relacionada con las funciones del cerebro que identifican la talla y 
la distancia de objetos y la actividad de figures.This se pueden hacer
en el país.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gehirn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Logik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anblick</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kamera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vorstellung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cerveau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">logique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vision</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">appareil-photo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">perception</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cérebro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
